description: BBC News NI's political editor examines what the push for Irish unity might look like.
title: Could EU's attitude to Irish unity mirror approach to German reunification?
title_page: Could EU's attitude to Irish unity mirror approach to German reunification? - BBC News
maintext: Mary Lou McDonald told BBC Newsnight that the EU "needs to take a stand in respect of Ireland in the same way that it supported the reunification of Germany, in the same way that it has a position on Cyprus, for example, and a positive approach to the reunification of that country".
